description: I'm into riddles and puzzles. Wether numerical, logical or lexical, If it's challenging - I'm game.
A trained musician. I bring passion and creativity (and perhaps pretentiousness).
An ideal space is packed with leaves. Ask me about my home.
Highly logical, absurdly organized. "A place for everything and everything in its place".
Specifically, soft spot for 4 legged and furry. Generally nothing with more than 2 eyes. No sea creatures.
